text: As he swung her on to the floor Gay saw Gavin and Simone go through the doorway that led down to the beach. Gay closed her eyes for a moment in disgust. She was fully aware that Gavin would make love to the French girl on the sands, and no doubt he would come back soon and after Simone had left expect her to accept his kisses on the way back to the hotel.
